thread.title: Klopp’s 1st Liverpool game ends 0-0 vs Tottenham
thread.title_full: Klopp’s 1st Liverpool game ends 0-0 vs Tottenham

author: wtopstaff
title: Klopp’s 1st Liverpool game ends 0-0 vs Tottenham
text:
Home » News » Sports » Klopp's 1st Liverpool game… Klopp’s 1st Liverpool game ends 0-0 vs Tottenham By The Associated Press October 17, 2015 9:42 am Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp gestures during the English Premier League soccer match between Tottenham Hotspur and Liverpool at the White Hart Lane, London, England, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Rui Vieira) 
LONDON (AP) — Juergen Klopp’s first game since taking over as Liverpool manager ended in a 0-0 draw with Tottenham in the Premier League on Saturday. 
Divock Origi, making his first Premier League start for Liverpool ahead of the injured Daniel Sturridge, hit the crossbar at White Hart Lane with a header in the 10th minute. 
Liverpool had more possession in the first half but Tottenham had better chances. 
Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet made a stunning one-handed save to deny Clinton N’Jie and also saved one-on-one against Harry Kane. 
Origi went close again in the second half, where Liverpool had the majority of the ball, but neither side could find a winning goal. Topics:
